name: hbe1w
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s0, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wn(w0)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s0, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wn(w0)))))

|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s0, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wn(w0)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wn(w0)))))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s0, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s0, wex(s0, w0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s0, wex(s0, w0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: Weak version of ~ hbe1 . See comments for ~ ax10w . Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2017.)
